00244 UINT32      OptionsScreenInit()
00245 {
00246 
00247       //Set so next time we come in, we can set up
00248       gfOptionsScreenEntry = TRUE;
00249 
00250       
00251       return( TRUE );
00252 }
00253 
00254 UINT32      OptionsScreenHandle()
00255 {
00256       StartFrameBufferRender();
00257 
00258       if( gfOptionsScreenEntry )
00259       {
00260             PauseGame();
00261             EnterOptionsScreen();
00262             gfOptionsScreenEntry = FALSE;
00263             gfOptionsScreenExit = FALSE;
00264             gfRedrawOptionsScreen = TRUE;
00265             RenderOptionsScreen();
00266 
00267             //Blit the background to the save buffer
00268             BlitBufferToBuffer( guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00269             InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00270       }
00271 
00272       RestoreBackgroundRects();
00273 
00274       GetOptionsScreenUserInput();
00275 
00276       HandleOptionsScreen();
00277 
00278       // WANNE 2 <redraw>
00279       if( gfRedrawOptionsScreen )
00280       {
00281             RenderOptionsScreen();
00282             RenderButtons();
00283 
00284             gfRedrawOptionsScreen = FALSE;
00285       }
00286 
00287       //Render the active slider bars
00288       RenderAllSliderBars();
00289 
00290       // render buttons marked dirty      
00291   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00292       RenderButtons( ); 
00293 
00294       // ATE: Put here to save RECTS before any fast help being drawn...
00295       SaveBackgroundRects( );
00296       RenderButtonsFastHelp();
00297 
00298 
00299       ExecuteBaseDirtyRectQueue();
00300       EndFrameBufferRender();
00301 
00302 
00303       if( gfOptionsScreenExit )
00304       {
00305             ExitOptionsScreen();
00306             gfOptionsScreenExit = FALSE;
00307             gfOptionsScreenEntry = TRUE;
00308 
00309             UnPauseGame();
00310       }
00311 
00312       return( guiOptionsScreen );
00313 }

00318 {
00319       return( TRUE );
00320 }

00328 BOOLEAN           EnterOptionsScreen()
00329 {
00330   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00331       UINT16 usPosY;
00332       UINT8 cnt;
00333       UINT16      usTextWidth, usTextHeight;
00334 
00335       // WANNE <do not draw the blackground back>
00336       //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, 0 );
00337       
00338       //Default this to off
00339       gfHideBloodAndGoreOption=FALSE;
00340 
00341 #ifndef BLOOD_N_GORE_ENABLED
00342       //This will hide blood and gore option
00343       gfHideBloodAndGoreOption = TRUE;
00344 
00345 /*
00346 Uncomment this to enable the check for files to activate the blood and gore option for the german build
00347       if( !FileExists( "Germany.dat" ) && FileExists( "Lecken.dat" ) )
00348       {
00349             gfHideBloodAndGoreOption = FALSE;
00350       }
00351       else
00352 */
00353       {
00354             gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] = FALSE;
00355       }
00356 #endif
00357 
00358 
00359       //if we are coming from mapscreen
00360       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
00361       {
00362             guiTacticalInterfaceFlags &= ~INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN;
00363             gfEnteredFromMapScreen = TRUE;
00364       }
00365 
00366 
00367       // Stop ambients...
00368       StopAmbients( );
00369 
00370       guiOptionsScreen = OPTIONS_SCREEN;
00371 
00372       //Init the slider bar;
00373       InitSlider();
00374 
00375       if( gfExitOptionsDueToMessageBox )
00376       {
00377             gfRedrawOptionsScreen = TRUE;
00378             gfExitOptionsDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
00379             return( TRUE );
00380       }
00381 
00382       gfExitOptionsDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
00383 
00384       // load the options screen background graphic and add it
00385       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00386       FilenameForBPP("INTERFACE\\OptionScreenBase.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00387       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiOptionBackGroundImage));
00388 
00389       // load button, title graphic and add it
00390       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00391       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_OPTIONHEADER );
00392       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiOptionsAddOnImages));
00393       
00394       //Save game button
00395       giOptionsButtonImages = LoadButtonImage("INTERFACE\\OptionScreenAddons.sti", -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
00396       guiOptGotoSaveGameBtn = CreateIconAndTextButton( giOptionsButtonImages, zOptionsText[OPT_SAVE_GAME], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00397                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00398                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00399                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00400                                                                                OPT_SAVE_BTN_X, OPT_SAVE_BTN_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00401                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnOptGotoSaveGameCallback);
00402       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiOptGotoSaveGameBtn, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00403       if( guiPreviousOptionScreen == MAINMENU_SCREEN || !CanGameBeSaved() )
00404       {
00405             DisableButton( guiOptGotoSaveGameBtn );
00406       }
00407 
00408       //Load game button
00409       giGotoLoadBtnImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( giOptionsButtonImages, -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
00410       guiOptGotoLoadGameBtn = CreateIconAndTextButton( giGotoLoadBtnImage, zOptionsText[OPT_LOAD_GAME], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00411                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00412                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00413                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00414                                                                                OPT_LOAD_BTN_X, OPT_LOAD_BTN_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00415                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnOptGotoLoadGameCallback);
00416 //    SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
00417 
00418 
00419       //Quit to main menu button
00420       giQuitBtnImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( giOptionsButtonImages, -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
00421       guiQuitButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( giQuitBtnImage, zOptionsText[OPT_MAIN_MENU], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00422                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00423                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00424                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00425                                                                                OPT_QUIT_BTN_X, OPT_QUIT_BTN_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00426                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnOptQuitCallback);
00427       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiQuitButton, DISABLED_STYLE_HATCHED );
00428 //    DisableButton( guiQuitButton );
00429 
00430       //Done button
00431       giDoneBtnImage = UseLoadedButtonImage( giOptionsButtonImages, -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
00432       guiDoneButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( giDoneBtnImage, zOptionsText[OPT_DONE], OPT_BUTTON_FONT, 
00433                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00434                                                                                OPT_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00435                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00436                                                                                OPT_DONE_BTN_X, OPT_DONE_BTN_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00437                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnDoneCallback);
00438 //    SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
00439 
00440 
00441 
00442       //
00443       // Toggle Boxes
00444       //
00445       usTextHeight = GetFontHeight( OPT_MAIN_FONT );
00446 
00447       //Create the first column of check boxes
00448       usPosY = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COLUMN_START_Y;
00449       gubFirstColOfOptions = OPT_FIRST_COLUMN_TOGGLE_CUT_OFF;
00450       for( cnt=0; cnt<gubFirstColOfOptions; cnt++)
00451       {
00452             //if this is the blood and gore option, and we are to hide the option
00453             if( cnt == TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE && gfHideBloodAndGoreOption )
00454             {
00455                   gubFirstColOfOptions++;
00456 
00457                   //advance to the next
00458                   continue;
00459             }
00460             //Check box to toggle tracking mode
00461             guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton( OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COLUMN_X, usPosY, 
00462                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheckBoxes_12x12.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00463                                                                                                             BtnOptionsTogglesCallback );
00464             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00465 
00466 
00467             usTextWidth = StringPixLength( zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], OPT_MAIN_FONT );
00468 
00469             if( usTextWidth > OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH )
00470             {
00471                   //Get how many lines will be used to display the string, without displaying the string
00472                   UINT8 ubNumLines = DisplayWrappedString( 0, 0, OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR, zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED | DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT ) / GetFontHeight( OPT_MAIN_FONT );
00473 
00474                   usTextWidth = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH;
00475 
00476                   //Create mouse regions for the option toggle text
00477                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt], OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COLUMN_X+13, usPosY, (UINT16)(OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COL_TEXT_X+usTextWidth), (UINT16)(usPosY+usTextHeight*ubNumLines), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00478                                                        CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectedOptionTextRegionMovementCallBack, SelectedOptionTextRegionCallBack ); 
00479                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt]); 
00480                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[ cnt ], 0, cnt);
00481             }
00482             else
00483             {
00484                   //Create mouse regions for the option toggle text
00485                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt], OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COLUMN_X+13, usPosY, (UINT16)(OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COL_TEXT_X+usTextWidth), (UINT16)(usPosY+usTextHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00486                                                        CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectedOptionTextRegionMovementCallBack, SelectedOptionTextRegionCallBack ); 
00487                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt]); 
00488                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[ cnt ], 0, cnt);
00489             }
00490 
00491 
00492             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[ cnt ], zOptionsScreenHelpText[cnt] );
00493             SetButtonFastHelpText( guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ], zOptionsScreenHelpText[cnt] );
00494 
00495             usPosY += OPT_GAP_BETWEEN_TOGGLE_BOXES;
00496       }
00497 
00498 
00499       //Create the 2nd column of check boxes
00500       usPosY = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COLUMN_START_Y;
00501       for( cnt=gubFirstColOfOptions; cnt<NUM_GAME_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00502       {
00503             //Check box to toggle tracking mode
00504             guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ] = CreateCheckBoxButton( OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_COLUMN_X, usPosY, 
00505                                                                                                             "INTERFACE\\OptionsCheckBoxes_12x12.sti", MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+10, 
00506                                                                                                             BtnOptionsTogglesCallback );
00507             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00508 
00509 
00510             //
00511             // Create mouse regions for the option toggle text
00512             //
00513 
00514 
00515             usTextWidth = StringPixLength( zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], OPT_MAIN_FONT );
00516 
00517             if( usTextWidth > OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH )
00518             {
00519                   //Get how many lines will be used to display the string, without displaying the string
00520                   UINT8 ubNumLines = DisplayWrappedString( 0, 0, OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR, zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED | DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT ) / GetFontHeight( OPT_MAIN_FONT );
00521 
00522                   usTextWidth = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH;
00523 
00524                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt], OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_COLUMN_X+13, usPosY, (UINT16)(OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_TEXT_X+usTextWidth), (UINT16)(usPosY+usTextHeight*ubNumLines), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00525                                                        CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectedOptionTextRegionMovementCallBack, SelectedOptionTextRegionCallBack ); 
00526                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt]); 
00527                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00528             }
00529             else
00530             {
00531                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt], OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_COLUMN_X+13, usPosY, (UINT16)(OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_TEXT_X+usTextWidth), (UINT16)(usPosY+usTextHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00532                                                        CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectedOptionTextRegionMovementCallBack, SelectedOptionTextRegionCallBack ); 
00533                   MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt]); 
00534                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[ cnt ], 0, cnt );
00535             }
00536 
00537 
00538             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[ cnt ], zOptionsScreenHelpText[cnt] );
00539             SetButtonFastHelpText( guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ], zOptionsScreenHelpText[cnt] );
00540 
00541             usPosY += OPT_GAP_BETWEEN_TOGGLE_BOXES;
00542       }
00543 
00544       //Create a mouse region so when the user leaves a togglebox text region we can detect it then unselect the region
00545       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedToggleBoxAreaRegion, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL,
00546                                            CURSOR_NORMAL, SelectedToggleBoxAreaRegionMovementCallBack, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK ); 
00547       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedToggleBoxAreaRegion ); 
00548 
00549 
00550       //Render the scene before adding the slider boxes
00551       RenderOptionsScreen();
00552 
00553       //Add a slider bar for the Sound Effects 
00554       guiSoundEffectsSliderID = AddSlider( SLIDER_VERTICAL_STEEL, CURSOR_NORMAL, OPT_SOUND_EFFECTS_SLIDER_X, OPT_SOUND_EFFECTS_SLIDER_Y, OPT_SLIDER_BAR_SIZE, 127, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, SoundFXSliderChangeCallBack, 0 );
00555       AssertMsg( guiSoundEffectsSliderID, "Failed to AddSlider" );
00556       SetSliderValue( guiSoundEffectsSliderID, GetSoundEffectsVolume() );
00557 
00558       //Add a slider bar for the Speech
00559       guiSpeechSliderID = AddSlider( SLIDER_VERTICAL_STEEL, CURSOR_NORMAL, OPT_SPEECH_SLIDER_X, OPT_SPEECH_SLIDER_Y, OPT_SLIDER_BAR_SIZE, 127, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, SpeechSliderChangeCallBack, 0 );
00560       AssertMsg( guiSpeechSliderID, "Failed to AddSlider" );
00561       SetSliderValue( guiSpeechSliderID, GetSpeechVolume() );
00562 
00563       //Add a slider bar for the Music
00564       guiMusicSliderID = AddSlider( SLIDER_VERTICAL_STEEL, CURSOR_NORMAL, OPT_MUSIC_SLIDER_X, OPT_MUSIC_SLIDER_Y, OPT_SLIDER_BAR_SIZE, 127, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, MusicSliderChangeCallBack, 0 );
00565       AssertMsg( guiMusicSliderID, "Failed to AddSlider" );
00566       SetSliderValue( guiMusicSliderID, MusicGetVolume() );
00567 
00568 
00569 
00570       //Remove the mouse region over the clock
00571       RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock(  );
00572 
00573       //Draw the screen
00574       gfRedrawOptionsScreen = TRUE;
00575 
00576       //Set the option screen toggle boxes
00577       SetOptionsScreenToggleBoxes();
00578 
00579       DisableScrollMessages();
00580 
00581       //reset
00582       gbHighLightedOptionText = -1;
00583 
00584       //get the status of the tree top option
00585       gfSettingOfTreeTopStatusOnEnterOfOptionScreen = gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_TREE_TOPS ];
00586 
00587       //Get the status of the item glow option
00588       gfSettingOfItemGlowStatusOnEnterOfOptionScreen = gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_GLOW_ITEMS ];
00589 
00590   gfSettingOfDontAnimateSmoke = gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ];
00591       return( TRUE );
00592 }
00593 
00594 
00595 void              ExitOptionsScreen()
00596 {
00597       UINT8 cnt;
00598 
00599       if( gfExitOptionsDueToMessageBox )
00600       {
00601             gfOptionsScreenExit = FALSE;
00602 
00603             if( !gfExitOptionsAfterMessageBox )
00604                   return;
00605             gfExitOptionsAfterMessageBox = FALSE;
00606             gfExitOptionsDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
00607       }
00608 
00609       //Get the current status of the toggle boxes
00610       GetOptionsScreenToggleBoxes();
00611       //The save the current settings to disk
00612       SaveGameSettings();
00613 
00614       //Create the clock mouse region
00615       CreateMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( CLOCK_REGION_START_X, CLOCK_REGION_START_Y );
00616 
00617       if( guiOptionsScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00618             EnterTacticalScreen( );
00619 
00620       RemoveButton( guiOptGotoSaveGameBtn );
00621       RemoveButton( guiOptGotoLoadGameBtn );
00622       RemoveButton( guiQuitButton );
00623       RemoveButton( guiDoneButton );
00624 
00625       UnloadButtonImage( giOptionsButtonImages );
00626       UnloadButtonImage( giGotoLoadBtnImage );
00627       UnloadButtonImage( giQuitBtnImage );
00628       UnloadButtonImage( giDoneBtnImage );
00629 
00630       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiOptionBackGroundImage );
00631       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiOptionsAddOnImages );
00632 
00633 
00634       //Remove the toggle buttons
00635       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GAME_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00636       {
00637             //if this is the blood and gore option, and we are to hide the option
00638             if( cnt == TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE && gfHideBloodAndGoreOption )
00639             {
00640                   //advance to the next
00641                   continue;
00642             }
00643 
00644             RemoveButton( guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ] );
00645 
00646         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedOptionTextRegion[cnt]);
00647       }
00648 
00649 
00650       //REmove the slider bars
00651       RemoveSliderBar( guiSoundEffectsSliderID );
00652       RemoveSliderBar( guiSpeechSliderID );
00653       RemoveSliderBar( guiMusicSliderID );
00654 
00655 
00656   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedToggleBoxAreaRegion );
00657 
00658       ShutDownSlider();
00659 
00660       //if we are coming from mapscreen
00661       if( gfEnteredFromMapScreen )
00662       {
00663             gfEnteredFromMapScreen = FALSE;
00664             guiTacticalInterfaceFlags |= INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN;
00665       }
00666 
00667       //if the user changed the  TREE TOP option, AND a world is loaded 
00668       if( gfSettingOfTreeTopStatusOnEnterOfOptionScreen != gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TOGGLE_TREE_TOPS ] && gfWorldLoaded )
00669       {
00670             SetTreeTopStateForMap();
00671       }
00672 
00673       //if the user has changed the item glow option AND a world is loaded
00674       if( gfSettingOfItemGlowStatusOnEnterOfOptionScreen != gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_GLOW_ITEMS ] && gfWorldLoaded )
00675       {
00676             ToggleItemGlow( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_GLOW_ITEMS ] );
00677       }
00678 
00679       if( gfSettingOfDontAnimateSmoke != gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ANIMATE_SMOKE ] && gfWorldLoaded )
00680       {
00681     UpdateSmokeEffectGraphics( );
00682   }
00683 
00684 }
00685

00687 
00688 void              HandleOptionsScreen()
00689 {
00690       HandleSliderBarMovementSounds();
00691 
00692       HandleHighLightedText( TRUE );
00693 }

00697 
00698 void              RenderOptionsScreen()
00699 {
00700   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00701       UINT16      usPosY;
00702       UINT8 cnt;
00703       UINT16      usWidth=0;
00704 
00705       //Get and display the background image
00706       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiOptionBackGroundImage);
00707   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00708 
00709       //Get and display the titla image
00710       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiOptionsAddOnImages);
00711   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00712   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1, iScreenWidthOffset, iScreenHeightOffset + 434, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00713 
00714 
00715 
00716       //
00717       // Text for the toggle boxes
00718       //
00719 
00720       usPosY = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COLUMN_START_Y + OPT_TOGGLE_TEXT_OFFSET_Y;
00721 
00722       //Display the First column of toggles
00723       for( cnt=0; cnt<gubFirstColOfOptions; cnt++)
00724       {
00725             //if this is the blood and gore option, and we are to hide the option
00726             if( cnt == TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE && gfHideBloodAndGoreOption )
00727             {
00728             //advance to the next
00729                   continue;
00730             }
00731 
00732             usWidth = StringPixLength( zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], OPT_MAIN_FONT );
00733 
00734             //if the string is going to wrap, move the string up a bit
00735             if( usWidth > OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH )
00736                   DisplayWrappedString( OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COL_TEXT_X, usPosY, OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00737             else
00738                   DrawTextToScreen( zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COL_TEXT_X, usPosY, 0, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED  );    
00739 
00740             usPosY += OPT_GAP_BETWEEN_TOGGLE_BOXES;
00741       }
00742 
00743 
00744       usPosY = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_COLUMN_START_Y + OPT_TOGGLE_TEXT_OFFSET_Y;
00745       //Display the 2nd column of toggles
00746       for( cnt=gubFirstColOfOptions; cnt<NUM_GAME_OPTIONS; cnt++)
00747       {
00748             usWidth = StringPixLength( zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], OPT_MAIN_FONT );
00749 
00750             //if the string is going to wrap, move the string up a bit
00751             if( usWidth > OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH )
00752                   DisplayWrappedString( OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_TEXT_X, usPosY, OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00753             else
00754                   DrawTextToScreen( zOptionsToggleText[ cnt ], OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_TEXT_X, usPosY, 0, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED     );    
00755 
00756             usPosY += OPT_GAP_BETWEEN_TOGGLE_BOXES;
00757       }
00758 
00759 
00760 
00761       
00762       //
00763       // Text for the Slider Bars
00764       //
00765 
00766       //Display the Sound Fx text
00767       DisplayWrappedString( OPT_SOUND_FX_TEXT_X, OPT_SOUND_FX_TEXT_Y, OPT_SLIDER_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_SLIDER_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, zOptionsText[ OPT_SOUND_FX ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED   );    
00768 
00769       //Display the Speech text
00770       DisplayWrappedString( OPT_SPEECH_TEXT_X, OPT_SPEECH_TEXT_Y, OPT_SLIDER_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_SLIDER_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, zOptionsText[ OPT_SPEECH ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED   );    
00771 
00772       //Display the Music text
00773       DisplayWrappedString( OPT_MUSIC_TEXT_X, OPT_MUSIC_TEXT_Y, OPT_SLIDER_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_SLIDER_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, zOptionsText[ OPT_MUSIC ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );   
00774       
00775       // WANNE <I think this is not used>
00776       InvalidateRegion( OPTIONS__TOP_LEFT_X, OPTIONS__TOP_LEFT_Y, OPTIONS__BOTTOM_RIGHT_X, OPTIONS__BOTTOM_RIGHT_Y);
00777 }

00785 
00786 
00787 void        GetOptionsScreenUserInput()
00788 {
00789       InputAtom Event;
00790       POINT  MousePos;
00791 
00792       GetCursorPos(&MousePos);
00793 
00794       while( DequeueEvent( &Event ) )
00795       {
00796             // HOOK INTO MOUSE HOOKS
00797             switch( Event.usEvent)
00798         {
00799                   case LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00800                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00801                         break;
00802                   case LEFT_BUTTON_UP:
00803                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y ,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);               
00804                         break;
00805                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN:
00806                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_DOWN, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);
00807                         break;
00808                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_UP: 
00809                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_UP, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);   
00810                         break;
00811                   case RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00812                         MouseSystemHook(RIGHT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                 
00813                         break;
00814                   case LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT: 
00815                         MouseSystemHook(LEFT_BUTTON_REPEAT, (INT16)MousePos.x, (INT16)MousePos.y,_LeftButtonDown, _RightButtonDown);                        
00816                         break;
00817             }
00818 
00819             if( !HandleTextInput( &Event ) && Event.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
00820             {
00821                   switch( Event.usParam )
00822                   {
00823                         case ESC:
00824                               SetOptionsExitScreen( guiPreviousOptionScreen );
00825                               break;
00826 
00827                         //Enter the save game screen
00828                         case 's':
00829                         case 'S':
00830                               //if the save game button isnt disabled
00831                               if( ButtonList[ guiOptGotoSaveGameBtn ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED )
00832                               {
00833                                     SetOptionsExitScreen( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
00834                                     gfSaveGame = TRUE;
00835                               }
00836                               break;
00837 
00838                         //Enter the Load game screen
00839                         case 'l':
00840                         case 'L':
00841                               SetOptionsExitScreen( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
00842                               gfSaveGame = FALSE;
00843                               break;
00844 
00845 
00846 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00847 
00848                         case 'r':
00849                               gfRedrawOptionsScreen = TRUE;
00850                               break;
00851 
00852                         case 'i':
00853                               InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00854                               break;
00855 
00856                               //Test keys
00857 
00858                         case 'y':
00859                               {
00860                               static      UINT32      uiTest2 = NO_SAMPLE;
00861                               if( !SoundIsPlaying( uiTest2 ) )
00862                                     uiTest2 = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Sounds\\RAID Dive.wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN );
00863                               }
00864                               break;
00865                         case 't':
00866                         {
00867 /*
00868                               {
00869                                     CHAR8       zCdromRootDrive[512];
00870                                     HWFILE      hFile;
00871 
00872                                     if( !GetCdromLocationFromIniFile( zCdromRootDrive ) )
00873                                           return;
00874 
00875                                     //Check if a file exists on the cdrom
00876                                     sprintf( zCdromRootDrive, "%sData\\NPC_Speech.slf", zCdromRootDrive );
00877 
00878                         //          if( FileExistsNoDB( zCdromRootDrive ) )
00879                                     hFile = FileOpen( zCdromRootDrive, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00880                                     if( hFile != 0 )
00881                                     {
00882                                           FileClose( hFile );
00883                                           sprintf( zCdromRootDrive, "%sData\\NPC_Speech.slf", zCdromRootDrive );
00884                                     }
00885                                     else
00886                                     {
00887                                           sprintf( zCdromRootDrive, "%sData\\NPC_Speech.slf", zCdromRootDrive );
00888                                     }
00889 
00890                                     uiLastTimeToCheckCDromDrive = GetJA2Clock();
00891                               }
00892 */
00893                         }
00894                         break;
00895 
00896 
00897                         case 'z':
00898                                SetErrorMode( SEM_FAILCRITICALERRORS );
00899                               break;
00900 
00901                         case 'q':
00902 //                            ShouldMercSayPrecedentToRepeatOneSelf( 11, 99 );
00903                               break;
00904 #endif
00905                   }
00906             }
00907       }
00908 }

00916 
00917 void BtnOptGotoSaveGameCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00918 {
00919       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00920       {
00921             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00922             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00923       }
00924       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00925       {
00926             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00927 
00928             SetOptionsExitScreen( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
00929             gfSaveGame = TRUE;
00930 
00931             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00932       }
00933       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00934       {
00935             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00936             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00937       }
00938 } 
00939 
00940 void BtnOptGotoLoadGameCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00941 {
00942       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00943       {
00944             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00945             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00946       }
00947       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00948       {
00949             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00950 
00951             SetOptionsExitScreen( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
00952             gfSaveGame = FALSE;
00953 
00954             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00955       }
00956       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00957       {
00958             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00959             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00960       }
00961 }

00963 
00964 void BtnOptQuitCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00965 {
00966       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00967       {
00968             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00969             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00970       }
00971       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00972       {
00973             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00974 
00975             //Confirm the Exit to the main menu screen
00976             DoOptionsMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zOptionsText[OPT_RETURN_TO_MAIN], OPTIONS_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmQuitToMainMenuMessageBoxCallBack );
00977 
00978 ///         SetOptionsExitScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
00979 
00980             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00981       }
00982       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00983       {
00984             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00985             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00986       }
00987 } 
00988 
00989 void BtnDoneCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00990 {
00991       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00992       {
00993             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00994             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00995       }
00996       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00997       {
00998             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00999 
01000             SetOptionsExitScreen( guiPreviousOptionScreen );
01001 
01002             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01003       }
01004       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01005       {
01006             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01007             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01008       }
01009 } 
01010 
01011 
01012 void BtnOptionsTogglesCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
01013 {
01014       UINT8 ubButton = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
01015 
01016       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01017       {
01018             if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
01019             {
01020                   HandleOptionToggle( ubButton, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE );
01021 
01022 //                gGameSettings.fOptions[ ubButton ] = TRUE;
01023                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01024             }
01025             else
01026             {
01027                   btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01028 
01029                   HandleOptionToggle( ubButton, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE);
01030             }
01031       }
01032       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01033       {
01034             if( btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
01035             {
01036                   HandleOptionToggle( ubButton, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE );
01037 
01038                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01039             }
01040             else
01041             {
01042                   btn->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01043 
01044                   HandleOptionToggle( ubButton, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE );
01045             }
01046       }
01047 
01048 }
01049 
01050 
01051 void HandleOptionToggle( UINT8 ubButton, BOOLEAN fState, BOOLEAN fDown, BOOLEAN fPlaySound )
01052 {
01053       static UINT32     uiOptionToggleSound = NO_SAMPLE;
01054       UINT32      uiSideToPlaySoundOn = MIDDLEPAN;
01055 //    static      BOOLEAN     fCheckBoxDrawnDownLastTime = FALSE;
01056 
01057       if( fState )
01058       {
01059             gGameSettings.fOptions[ ubButton ] = TRUE;
01060 
01061             ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ ubButton ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01062 
01063             if( fDown )
01064                   DrawCheckBoxButtonOn( guiOptionsToggles[ ubButton ] );
01065       }
01066       else
01067       {
01068             gGameSettings.fOptions[ ubButton ] = FALSE;
01069 
01070             ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ ubButton ] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01071       
01072             if( fDown )
01073                   DrawCheckBoxButtonOff( guiOptionsToggles[ ubButton ] );
01074 
01075             //check to see if the user is unselecting either the spech or subtitles toggle
01076             if( ubButton == TOPTION_SPEECH  || ubButton == TOPTION_SUBTITLES )
01077             {
01078                   //make sure that at least of of the toggles is still enabled
01079                   if( !(ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ TOPTION_SPEECH ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON) )
01080                   {
01081                         if( !( ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ) )
01082                         {
01083                               gGameSettings.fOptions[ ubButton ] = TRUE;
01084                               ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ ubButton ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01085 
01086                               //Confirm the Exit to the main menu screen
01087                               DoOptionsMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zOptionsText[OPT_NEED_AT_LEAST_SPEECH_OR_SUBTITLE_OPTION_ON], OPTIONS_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
01088                               gfExitOptionsDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
01089                         }
01090                   }
01091             }
01092       }
01093 
01094 
01095 
01096       //stop the sound if
01097 //    if( SoundIsPlaying( uiOptionToggleSound ) && !fDown )
01098       {
01099             SoundStop( uiOptionToggleSound );
01100       }
01101 
01102 
01103       if( fPlaySound )
01104       {
01105             if( fDown )
01106             {
01107             //                      case BTN_SND_CLICK_OFF:
01108                   PlayJA2Sample( BIG_SWITCH3_IN, RATE_11025, BTNVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
01109             }
01110             else
01111             {
01112             //          case BTN_SND_CLICK_ON:
01113                   PlayJA2Sample( BIG_SWITCH3_OUT, RATE_11025, BTNVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );              
01114             }
01115       }
01116 }

01167 void              ConfirmQuitToMainMenuMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
01168 {
01169       // yes, Quit to main menu
01170   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
01171       {
01172             gfEnteredFromMapScreen = FALSE;
01173             gfExitOptionsAfterMessageBox = TRUE;
01174             SetOptionsExitScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
01175 
01176             //We want to reinitialize the game
01177             ReStartingGame();
01178       }
01179       else
01180       {
01181             gfExitOptionsAfterMessageBox = FALSE;
01182             gfExitOptionsDueToMessageBox = FALSE;
01183       }

01187 void SetOptionsScreenToggleBoxes()
01188 {
01189       UINT8 cnt;
01190 
01191       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GAME_OPTIONS; cnt++)
01192       {
01193             if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ cnt ] )
01194                   ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01195             else
01196                   ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01197       }
01198 }

01202 
01203 void GetOptionsScreenToggleBoxes()
01204 {
01205       UINT8 cnt;
01206 
01207       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_GAME_OPTIONS; cnt++)
01208       {
01209             if( ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ cnt ] ]->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON )
01210                   gGameSettings.fOptions[ cnt ] = TRUE;
01211             else
01212                   gGameSettings.fOptions[ cnt ] = FALSE;
01213       }
01214 }

01216 void HandleSliderBarMovementSounds()
01217 {
01218       static UINT32     uiLastSoundFxTime=0;
01219       static UINT32     uiLastSpeechTime=0;
01220       UINT32      uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
01221       static UINT32     uiLastPlayingSoundID = NO_SAMPLE;
01222       static UINT32     uiLastPlayingSpeechID = NO_SAMPLE;
01223 
01224       if( ( uiLastSoundFxTime - OPT_MUSIC_SLIDER_PLAY_SOUND_DELAY ) > guiSoundFxSliderMoving )
01225       {
01226             guiSoundFxSliderMoving = 0xffffffff;
01227 
01228             //The slider has stopped moving, reset the ambient sector sounds ( so it will change the volume )
01229             if( !DidGameJustStart() )
01230                   HandleNewSectorAmbience( gTilesets[ giCurrentTilesetID ].ubAmbientID );
01231 
01232             if( !SoundIsPlaying( uiLastPlayingSoundID ) )
01233                   uiLastPlayingSoundID = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "Sounds\\Weapons\\LMG Reload.wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1 , MIDDLEPAN );
01234       }
01235       else
01236             uiLastSoundFxTime = GetJA2Clock();
01237 
01238 
01239       if( ( uiLastSpeechTime - OPT_MUSIC_SLIDER_PLAY_SOUND_DELAY ) > guiSpeechSliderMoving )
01240       {
01241             guiSpeechSliderMoving = 0xffffffff;
01242 
01243             if( !SoundIsPlaying( uiLastPlayingSpeechID ) )
01244                   uiLastPlayingSpeechID = PlayJA2GapSample( "BattleSnds\\m_cool.wav", RATE_11025, HIGHVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN, NULL );
01245       }
01246       else
01247             uiLastSpeechTime = GetJA2Clock();
01248 
01249 }

01253 
01254 void SelectedOptionTextRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01255 {
01256       UINT8 ubButton = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01257 
01258       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01259       {
01260             HandleOptionToggle( ubButton, (BOOLEAN)(!gGameSettings.fOptions[ ubButton ]), FALSE, TRUE );
01261 
01262             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01263       }
01264 
01265 
01266       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )//iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT || 
01267       {
01268             if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ ubButton ] )
01269             {
01270                   HandleOptionToggle( ubButton, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE );
01271             }
01272             else
01273             {
01274                   HandleOptionToggle( ubButton, FALSE, TRUE, TRUE );
01275             }
01276       }
01277 }
01278 
01279 
01280 void SelectedOptionTextRegionMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
01281 {
01282       INT8  bButton = (INT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01283 
01284       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01285       {
01286 
01287             HandleHighLightedText( FALSE );
01288 
01289             gbHighLightedOptionText = -1;
01290 
01291             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01292       }
01293       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01294       {
01295             gbHighLightedOptionText = bButton;
01296 
01297             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01298       }
01299 }
01300 
01301 
01302 void HandleHighLightedText( BOOLEAN fHighLight )
01303 {
01304       UINT16            usPosX=0;
01305       UINT16            usPosY=0;
01306       UINT8             ubCnt;
01307       INT8              bHighLight=-1;
01308       UINT16            usWidth;
01309 
01310       static      INT8  bLastRegion = -1;
01311 
01312       if( gbHighLightedOptionText == -1 )
01313             fHighLight = FALSE;
01314 
01315       //if the user has the mouse in one of the checkboxes
01316       for( ubCnt=0; ubCnt<NUM_GAME_OPTIONS;ubCnt++)
01317       {
01318             if( ubCnt == TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE && gfHideBloodAndGoreOption )
01319             {
01320                   //advance to the next
01321                   continue;
01322             }
01323 
01324             if( ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ ubCnt ] ]->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA )
01325             {
01326                   gbHighLightedOptionText = ubCnt;
01327                   fHighLight = TRUE;
01328             }
01329       }
01330 
01331       // If there is a valid section being highlighted
01332       if( gbHighLightedOptionText != -1 )
01333       {
01334             bLastRegion = gbHighLightedOptionText;
01335       }
01336 
01337       bHighLight = gbHighLightedOptionText;
01338 
01339 
01340       if( bLastRegion != -1 && gbHighLightedOptionText == -1 )
01341       {
01342             fHighLight = FALSE;
01343             bHighLight = bLastRegion;
01344             bLastRegion = -1;
01345       }
01346 
01347       //If we are to hide the blood and gore option, and we are to highlight an option past the blood and gore option
01348       //reduce the highlight number by 1
01349       if( bHighLight >= TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE && gfHideBloodAndGoreOption )
01350       {
01351             bHighLight--;
01352       }
01353 
01354       if( bHighLight != -1 )
01355       {
01356             if( bHighLight < OPT_FIRST_COLUMN_TOGGLE_CUT_OFF )
01357             {
01358                   usPosX = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COL_TEXT_X;
01359                   usPosY = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_FIRST_COLUMN_START_Y + OPT_TOGGLE_TEXT_OFFSET_Y + ( bHighLight * OPT_GAP_BETWEEN_TOGGLE_BOXES ) ;
01360             }
01361             else
01362             {
01363                   usPosX = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_TEXT_X;
01364                   usPosY = OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_SECOND_COLUMN_START_Y + OPT_TOGGLE_TEXT_OFFSET_Y + ( ( bHighLight - OPT_FIRST_COLUMN_TOGGLE_CUT_OFF ) * OPT_GAP_BETWEEN_TOGGLE_BOXES ) ;
01365             }
01366 
01367             //If we are to hide the blood and gore option, and we are to highlight an option past the blood and gore option
01368             //reduce the highlight number by 1
01369             if( bHighLight >= TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE && gfHideBloodAndGoreOption )
01370             {
01371                   bHighLight++;
01372             }
01373 
01374 
01375             usWidth = StringPixLength( zOptionsToggleText[ bHighLight ], OPT_MAIN_FONT );
01376 
01377             //if the string is going to wrap, move the string up a bit
01378             if( usWidth > OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH )
01379             {
01380                   if( fHighLight )
01381                         DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, usPosY, OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR, zOptionsToggleText[ bHighLight ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01382 //                      DrawTextToScreen( zOptionsToggleText[ bHighLight ], usPosX, usPosY, 0, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED    );    
01383                   else
01384                         DisplayWrappedString( usPosX, usPosY, OPT_TOGGLE_BOX_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, zOptionsToggleText[ bHighLight ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01385 //                      DrawTextToScreen( zOptionsToggleText[ bHighLight ], usPosX, usPosY, 0, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );    
01386             }
01387             else
01388             {
01389                   if( fHighLight )
01390                         DrawTextToScreen( zOptionsToggleText[ bHighLight ], usPosX, usPosY, 0, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED    );    
01391                   else
01392                         DrawTextToScreen( zOptionsToggleText[ bHighLight ], usPosX, usPosY, 0, OPT_MAIN_FONT, OPT_MAIN_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, TRUE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );    
01393             }
01394       }
01395 }

01398 
01399 void SelectedToggleBoxAreaRegionMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
01400 {
01401       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01402       {
01403       }
01404       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01405       {
01406             UINT8 ubCnt;
01407       
01408             //loop through all the toggle box's and remove the in area flag
01409             for( ubCnt=0;ubCnt<NUM_GAME_OPTIONS;ubCnt++)
01410             {
01411                   ButtonList[ guiOptionsToggles[ ubCnt ] ]->Area.uiFlags &= ~MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA;
01412             }
01413 
01414             gbHighLightedOptionText = -1;
01415 
01416             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01417       }
01418 }
